titleStmt.title: The institution, laws & ceremonies of the most noble Order of the Garter collected and digested into one body by Elias Ashmole ...
titleStmt.author: Ashmole, Elias, 1617-1692.
Hollar, Wenceslaus, 1607-1677.
Sherwin, William, fl. 1670-1710.

biblFull.extent: [13], 719 [i.e. 715], [102] p., [45] folded leaves of plates : ill., coats of arms, port.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock, for Nathanael Brooke ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Nearly all the engravings signed: Wenceslaus Hollar. The portrait of King Charles II was engraved by William Sherwin.
